title: Unable to define new folder
content: I click on an existing folder, then click New Folder. Nothing happens. No error message is given.
creator: sweettasha

title: I'd like to use microsoft exchanges in thunderbird
content: I'd like to use microsoft exchanges in to the thunderbird desktop app. Is that possible? I've tried to set it up but it doesn't seem to be working. I'm able to receive emails but when I try to send it asks for a password and it says it's not correct....
creator: karenbatten

title: OAuth2 does not work with microsoft 365 operated by 21 vianet
content:
Hello.

I read that thunderbird works with Microsoft 365 and modern authentication. I tested with Microsoft 365 accounts and it worked fine. The problems come with an accounting of Microsoft 365 operated by 21vianet service.

I configured according to https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202 with the IMAP and SMTP settings from https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/settings-for-pop-and-imap-access-for-microsoft-365-operated-by-21vianet-ca51235d-afc5-4d7d-843c-3616a37d5771

It complaints "The IMAP server partner.outlook.cn does not support the selected authentication method. Please change the 'Authentication method' in the 'Account Settings | Server settings.'"

In SMTP settings there is no option to configure OAuth2
creator: qirunzhang

title: Cartelle junk\spam scaricano posta solo quando ci clicco.
content:
Come da titolo, ho un problema per le email di posta indesiderata. Sia con gmail che con hotmail, non scarica la posta indesiderata a meno che io non clicchi sulle cartelle predisposte (junk o spam). A quel punto scarica tutto lo spam. Vorrei lo facesse in automatico. Ho 4 account di posta e non vorrei ogni tanto entrare e controllare manualmente.

Allego lo screen di come ho impostato la posta indesiderata.
creator: manhattan

title: Come modificare o annullare mail ricorrente - INVIA DOPO
content:
Ho impostato una mail ricorrente dal mio indirizzo ad altri 2 indirizzi, che parte ogni mattina alle ore 8.00 Ora se io volessi fermare o modificare il testo di questa mail, come posso fare ad agire su questa mail ricorrente? ho cercato sui men√π ma non trovo il modo di raggiungerla nuovamente.

Grazie
creator: roberto102

title: Thunderbird not responding
content: Hello, Thunderbird freezes every 5 minutes, showing the message "not responding". I have the 115 version installed on a Windows 10 PC. Both are updated. Checking on the forum, I have tried to pause the antivirus program and the firewall, without success. Exploring the problem, it seems to be related to an unusual I/O net waiting process. Most interestingly, I also had the same problem with a Linux Mint 21.3 laptop, with the "same" Thunderbird 115 version. However, I could fix that problem using Evolution :/. Please, send me any idea or suggestion that may help, it will be greatly appreciated! Thank you very much!
creator: ricardo.casasola

title: adding shared exchange mailboxes to thunderbird
content: Good day, I need an advice. I am moving my email addresses from my mail server to Exchange. I want to continue using thunderbird and I need advice on how to add shared exchange mailboxes to thunderbird. I added my main email address (that's OK), but now I need to add shared mailboxes that don't have their own login, they are only set up as shared mailboxes in the exchange admin. Thank you
creator: david.bikerscrown

title: password
content: I forgot my account password. The stored password for the configuration does not exist either.

title: thunderbird
content: il programma si interrompe e si blocca. Mi dice di attendere o chiudere. Aspetto un po' e poi chiudo. Riavvio il programma e dopo un po' si ri blocca. Che devo fare?
creator: falarenzo

title: How to get TB shown in the share windows instead of outlook
content: If I right-click on any photo or item in the explorer and choose "share", the mailadresses that show up as options in the "share window" is not associated with Thunderbird, but with Outlook. I have tried every solution I have found on the net, incl. making sure TB was chosen as the mail client for any file type, removing any leftovers from outlook and from registration data base, but still only adresses connected with Outlook shows up (and I can see that it is from an old mailing list, that does not include more recent contacts). So why does the share windows not have assess to Thunderbird and its mail adresses?
creator: o.larsen1
